title: Calories in a California Roll
meta_description: Discover calories in california roll, including macros, full nutrition breakdown per roll, and simple tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard California roll with imitation crab, avocado, cucumber, sushi rice, nori seaweed; 8 pieces, no added sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, brand, portion size, rice type, and ingredients; check labels or ask for specifics when available.

quick_answer.text: One California roll has about 255 kcal, with 38 g carbs and 9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use real crab instead of imitation

faqs.q: How many calories in one california roll?
faqs.a: Approximately 255 kcal for a standard 8-piece roll.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a california roll?
faqs.a: About 38 g carbs, mostly from sushi rice, with 3 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a california roll high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 650 mg per roll due to seasoned rice and seaweed.

faqs.q: How much protein in california roll?
faqs.a: Roughly 9 g protein from imitation crab and rice.

faqs.q: Does california roll have healthy fats?
faqs.a: Yes, 7 g total fat including some from avocado, but low in saturated fat (1 g).
